panel.field: This patch allows you to modify the Balrog (Missiles) entity and his Missiles.

panel.title: Balrog's Missiles
panel.field: Missile Quantity:
*The higher the value, the more missiles Balrog will shoot.
**30 is the default value.
WARNING: a value over 99 may break your game.
Missile Intelligence:
*The higher the value, the more precise and direct the missiles home in on Quote.
Missile Speed (Left)
*The higher the value, the slower the missiles travel left.
Missile Acceleration (Left)
*The higher the value, the slower the missiles accelerate left.
Missile Speed (Right)
*The lower the value, the slower the missiles travel right.
Missile Acceleration (Right)
*The lower the value, the slower the missiles accelerate right.

panel.title: Balrog (Missiles) Attributes
panel.field: Missile firing behavior frequency:
*The higher the value, the more often Balrog will jump and shoot missiles.
Waiting Time:
*Balrog's waiting time before he runs. The higher the value, the longer Balrog will stand around before he starts moving.
Grab Timer:
*The lower the value, the quicker Quote gets thrown from Balrog's grasp.

panel.title: Balrog (Missiles) Misc. Cosmetics
panel.field: Running animation speed:
*The higher the value, the slower the running animation is.
Sound Effect for Balrog's running animation:
Experiment, and have fun!
